bug.author: Cerebrock
bug.description: Error when downloading 'sp' fasttext spanish embeddings from google colab. OSError: HEAD request failed for url https://s3.eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/alan-nlp/resources/embeddings-v0.4/sp-wiki-fasttext-300d-1M.vectors.npy

comments.comment: I think spanish is 'es'. Could you try this?
